# 元梦之星农场自动化脚本配置文件
# 每行一个命令序列，清晰易维护
# 支持注释（以#开头的行会被忽略）

# 牧场
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 SWIPE:446,686,535,872,1864 2005,852 3000ms SWIPE:341,779,643,969,3364 SWIPE:378,864,366,625,1196 SWIPE:421,800,181,728,2963 SWIPE:340,806,512,633,1146 SWIPE:320,700,685,935,2856 SWIPE:398,862,316,608,1474 SWIPE:444,797,164,791,2249 SWIPE:296,819,434,655,1098 SWIPE:302,740,578,1000,2918

# 农场第六列
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 2000,860 SWIPE:2000,500,2090,500,500 1000ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A3 500ms

# 农场第五列
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 SWIPE:2000,500,1980,510,500 2000,860 SWIPE:2000,500,2080,500,500 1000ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A3 500ms

# 农场第四列
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 SWIPE:2000,500,1950,530,500 2000,860 SWIPE:2000,500,2080,500,500 1000ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A3 500ms

# 农场第三列
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 SWIPE:2000,500,1890,560,500 2000,860 SWIPE:2000,500,2110,500,500 1000ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A3 500ms

# 农场第二列
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 SWIPE:2000,500,1820,570,500 2000,860 SWIPE:2000,500,2145,500,500 1000ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A3 500ms

# 农场第一列
2160,980 1500ms D3 1990,600 SWIPE:2000,500,1735,605,500 2000,860 SWIPE:2000,500,2175,500,500 1000ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A4 500ms A3 500ms

# 简单移动测试
# W2 A2 S2 D2

# 点击测试
# 540,960 500ms 1080,540 500ms 540,1920

# 滑动测试
# SWIPE:800,600,800,300,500 500ms SWIPE:800,300,800,600,500
